meanings.definition: A ship used by such persons.
meanings.sent1: The pirs' vessel was swift and deadly on the open sea.
meanings.sent2: The navy intercepted the pirs' ship before it could reach the harbor.
meanings.sent3: The pirs' boat had a parrot as a lookout, squawking warnings of danger.
meanings.sent4: The pirs' craft was a shadow on the water, disappearing into the mist.
meanings.sent5: The crew of the pirs' ship hoisted the black flag before attacking.
